mapper.select: SELECT b.*, a.allo_date FROM (SELECT al.* FROM (SELECT busid,MAX(allocateid) allocateid FROM allocate GROUP BY busid) bid JOIN allocate al ON al.allocateid=bid.allocateid) a RIGHT JOIN bus b ON b.busid = a.busid where b.bus_num=#{bus_num} ORDER BY a.allo_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus (bus_num, limit_passenger, intro_year, state) VALUES (#{bus_num}, #{limit_passenger}, #{intro_year}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, a.allo_date, a.cancel_check FROM (SELECT al.* FROM (SELECT busid,MAX(allocateid) allocateid FROM allocate GROUP BY busid) bid JOIN allocate al ON al.allocateid=bid.allocateid) a RIGHT JOIN bus b ON b.busid = a.busid ORDER BY a.allo_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE bus SET bus_num = #{bus_num}, limit_passenger = #{limit_passenger}, intro_year = #{intro_year}, state = #{state} WHERE busid = #{busid}
